subject: Hi All
msgSnippet: Hi EveryOne, I need to test the code at run time.I am using intellij as the IDE and WebLogic as my server.My portal is running on weblogic. I have written a
messageBody:
Hi EveryOne,

I need to test the code at run time.I am using intellij as the
IDE and WebLogic as my server.My portal is running on weblogic.

I have written a test case.I gave a run to that which gave me
sucess even if my portal was stopped.
Which means even if my application is stopped the Test is
sucessful.I want that my test should be success only when my portal
is running.
Can i conclude that portal running on diff JVM and my own Test
Case in different JVM.If so , suggest me the solution.
How will my Test Case run in same JVM in which my application is
running.


Thanks,
Jayesh
